examples: $ twitchvod fetch https://www.twitch.tv/videos/401113393 --res=720p60 --out=Some path for output file here

args.name: vod
args.description: Link to twitch VOD url or ID

info.description: Fetches basic information about Twitch.tv video
examples:
$ twitchvod info https://www.twitch.tv/videos/401113393
